name: Hal Waldman & Associates
tag_list: personal-injury, medical-malpractice, motor-vehicle-accident, wrongful-death, slip-and-fall, car-accident, truck-accident, dog-bite, medical-negligence, workplace-injury
description: Law office of Hal Waldman & Associates
overview: Hal Waldman & Associates serves clients in Allegheny County, western Pennsylvania and statewide in the areas of motor vehicle accidents, personal injury, medical malpractice and wrongful death. We provide a cost-free, obligation-free evaluation and consultation regarding your slip-and-fall accident, motor vehicle accident, workplace injury, dog bite, medical negligence or pharmaceutical injury.
